project_descr: The project objective is to: “Reduce vulnerability of communities to the adverse impacts of climate change through participative design, community-based management and diversification of afforestation and reforestation programmes.”

outputs.output_descr: Reduce vulnerability of communities in the project area to the adverse impacts of climate change through participative design, community-based management and diversification of afforestation and reforestation programmes.

document_name: Signed Project Document GEFLDCFII Afforestation an dReforestation
